QuestData.Title: Tear Down This Wall!
QuestData.Description: The time has come. Our forces are well-enough entrenched here that we can risk pressing forward, into the Thunder King's lair. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like he'll be opening that gate anytime soon.$b$bI suppose we'll have to make a gate of our own then. Let me know when you're ready, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lady Jaina Proudmoore, then break into the lower city and secure it for the Alliance.
QuestData.RewardText: With your help, we're one giant step closer to our goal.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Lady Jaina Proudmoore to begin your mission
